videoJson.name: Shibaden 1/2"
videoJson.fact1: This format was also marketed under Apeco Teletape, Bell & Howell,  and a similar format by  Bang & Olfson
videoJson.fact2: Shibaden is a  combined name  from two Japanese  manufacturers:  Shiba Electric  and Denshi.
videoJson.fact3: This format was  a short-lived  predecessor to  the EIAJ-1 format  and is not compatible (even  though reels  look identical)
